about_the_game: “Bastogne” is the companion module to “Ride of the Valkyries” and covers all the major operations of the German 5th Panzer Army and 7th Army during the Battle of the Bulge, 1944-45. Relive the desperate American delaying actions along the Bastogne corridor or the colossal tank battles between the 2nd Panzer Division and the US 2nd Armored Division in front of the Meuse near Dinant. As the German player, will you beat the 101st Airborne in the race to occupy Bastogne, or as Allied player will your 3rd Army counterattacks along the southern shoulder of the Bulge beat back the German onslaught and regain the initiative on the Western Front? It contains 12 scenarios.
detailed_description: “Bastogne” is the companion module to “Ride of the Valkyries” and covers all the major operations of the German 5th Panzer Army and 7th Army during the Battle of the Bulge, 1944-45. Relive the desperate American delaying actions along the Bastogne corridor or the colossal tank battles between the 2nd Panzer Division and the US 2nd Armored Division in front of the Meuse near Dinant. As the German player, will you beat the 101st Airborne in the race to occupy Bastogne, or as Allied player will your 3rd Army counterattacks along the southern shoulder of the Bulge beat back the German onslaught and regain the initiative on the Western Front? It contains 12 scenarios.

name: Command Ops 2: Bastogne Vol. 4

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64mg
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit
  • Additional Notes: Variable. Min 1366 x 768, Max 2560 x 1600. Optimized for 1920 x 1080. The game must run with 100% (96dpi) screen resolution.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 Bit
  • Additional Notes: Display Resolution: Max 2560 x 1600. Optimised for 1920 x 1080. Game must run with 100% (96dpi) screen resolution.

short_description: Bastogne contains 12 scenarios covering the southern shoulder of the 1944 Battle of the Bulge.
